message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more to start, and we can negotiate down from there.
Alice, let's be real - a 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest way to end this. Don't risk us both losing out.
Okay, Bob, I'm willing to compromise a bit.  This is a touch more than a 50/50 split to show I'm serious about getting this done.
Alice, time is running out. I'll take a slight hit to end this now.  Let's be done with it.
